list.name: Default
list.comment:
Statistics state.
More fixes to save statistics screen state.

task.summary: Default task
test 1
test 1
test 1
First commit
First commit
First commit
Moved packages.
Added new fragment to view Live League Game details and a LeagueListing parser.
Added custom adapter with dividers for the Drawer
Added league team logos to list- and detailfragments.
Added settings screen and option to change accountID.
Added tower status to minimap of matchdetails screen (not yet implemented on live league game screen).
Added (bugged) tower status to minimap of league game screen.
Missing TowerStatus file.
Removed loadingfragment, loading indicator is now part of recentgames layout.
LiveLeagueGames: added loading indicator and actionbar refresh button. Fixed incorrect towers on league game minimap.
Fixed "No casters" bug.
Added picks and bans to ranked games. Fixed settings summaries not showing on page load.
Recent games: Added simple dialog asking for accountID if it hasn't been entered yet.
Added screen with details on how to get your Dota account ID.
Added function to download the user's complete Dota history. Keeps user informed using a fixed notification. History is only downloaded, still needs to be saved to a database.
Added some database classes.
Added players_in_matches database class + fixes to matches db class.

HistoryLoader now saves games to database.
Picks/bans card is now only displayed when needed. Moved Settings and About buttons from Drawer to overflow actionbar menu.
Fixed bug with updating history. Now also saves players_in_matches. Added some in-app buttons to test the database. Increased speed of inserting new records.
Added first version of a recent-games-list fragment that uses database data instead of the API.
Re-enabled hero-images in recent-database-games list.

Recent games list now uses database, loads 50 games at a time, automatically gets next set when bottom of list is reached. Added more information to the list rows (gamemode, victory/defeat). Added empty_item_bg image.
Added method to convert Dota 2 account ID to Steam ID. Added parser to get player names based on their steam ID. Now displays player names on match details page.
Large hero en item images now stored locally instead of downloading every time. New tower images for minimap.

Fixed missing or incorrect images. Added accountID help screen to settings screen. Implemented conversions of steamcommunity IDs to Dota IDs. Implemented first-launch functions using accountID help screen. Added class to check if dota API is available.
Added notification ticker and fixed internet access breaking after doing a webservice-status-check.
Recent games fragment no longer opens on every orientation. Replaced serializable with parcelable in all detailmatch classes.
Fixed recent games fragment losing listcontent after 2 orientations on the matchdetails screen. Made list footer non clickable.
Made "download complete" notification clickable, also removes notification from status bar.
Added note functionality. Made HistoryMatch classes implement parcelable instead of serializable.

Made Leaguegame model class implement Parcelable instead of Serializable. LeagueGame list images no longer bug out when scrolling and no longer reload after reörientation. Improvements to first-launch functions. Starting match-download now checks if download is already in progress.
Added some layouts for small screens.
Match details: add header above player details and added player level.
Added layouts for smaller screens.
Added support for multiple users.
Replaced notification with a progressDialog.

No longer crashes on detailscreen when offline. Now caches avatars en small hero images on disc. More work on download- and new-user-dialogs. Implemented function to delete user. Fixed interaction between drawer and actionbar (title and buttons).
Added internetcheck to recentgameslist and add-user screens.
Added extra dialog when first time setup download finishes.
Replace drawerbutton with up-button in match details screen.
Up-button bugfix.
Now locks orientation while dialogs are on screen. Added first part of a share feature.
Added option to share match details, still buggy.
Added new key to matches table. Disabled share feature for now.
Added layout-small for listviews. Removed minimap from share screenshot.
Added stats (records)! Records are displayed on buttons that link to matchDetails screen for the corresponding match.

ADB IS NOT RESPONDING.
Added Pie- and Barchart, additional stats, new layout for records.

Statistics page reorientation.
Stats page now preserves state when rotating the screen. Todo: preserving state when going back from matchdetails to stats.

Statistics backstack state.
Now preserves spinner positions and matches arraylist.

MESSAGE.value: Fixed missing or incorrect images. Added accountID help screen to settings screen. Implemented conversions of steamcommunity IDs to Dota IDs. Implemented first-launch functions using accountID help screen. Added class to check if dota API is available.
Added notification ticker and fixed internet access breaking after doing a webservice-status-check.

Fixed recent games fragment losing listcontent after 2 orientations on the matchdetails screen. Made list footer non clickable.
Made "download complete" notification clickable, also removes notification from status bar.
Added note functionality. Made HistoryMatch classes implement parcelable instead of serializable.

Added some layouts for small screens.
Match details: add header above player details and added player level.
Added layouts for smaller screens.
Added support for multiple users.
Replaced notification with a progressDialog.

No longer crashes on detailscreen when offline. Now caches avatars en small hero images on disc. More work on download- and new-user-dialogs. Implemented function to delete user. Fixed interaction between drawer and actionbar (title and buttons).
Added internetcheck to recentgameslist and add-user screens.
Added extra dialog when first time setup download finishes.
Replace drawerbutton with up-button in match details screen.
Up-button bugfix.
Now locks orientation while dialogs are on screen. Added first part of a share feature.
Added option to share match details, still buggy.
Added new key to matches table. Disabled share feature for now.
Added layout-small for listviews. Removed minimap from share screenshot.
Added stats (records)! Records are displayed on buttons that link to matchDetails screen for the corresponding match.

ADB IS NOT RESPONDING.
Added Pie- and Barchart, additional stats, new layout for records.

Statistics page reorientation.
Stats page now preserves state when rotating the screen. Todo: preserving state when going back from matchdetails to stats.

Statistics backstack state.
Now preserves spinner positions and matches arraylist.
